attr.title: Graze Counter GM
attr.desc: A refreshing and highly re-playable bullet hell style shooter that WANTS you to play dangerously! Ride the razor's edge of life and death in this high-risk high-reward danger oriented arcade style shooting game.
attr.desc_md: *"A refreshing and highly re-playable bullet hell style shooter that WANTS you to play dangerously! Ride the razor's edge of life and death in this high-risk high-reward danger oriented arcade style shooting game."*
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam. Add the assets to the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1486440/Graze_Counter_GM/). Add the assets to the gamedata folder.
